TelegramCCNewsDescriptionText: We follow the breaking news around the world about cryptocurrencies from all premium and free sources and filter the headlines that will market-moving and present them to you.
TelegramCELBDescriptionText: Crypto Exchange Listing Bot; if a coin & token is listed on Coinbase, Robinhood, UPbit or Grayscale, it will automatically transaction open "in seconds" with API's from your Binance or FTX account.
TelegramCCNewsBotDescriptionText:
Automatically opening trades to the headlines that market-moving.
Coming Soon.
TelegramStatusNotMemberMessage: You do not currently have a subscription to any package.
TelegramStatusMemberMessage:
Your current subscription *[expirydate]* will continue to date.
nIf you want to extend it, you can buy one more package now.
The duration of the package you receive will be added to your remaining time.
TelegramPaymentText:
Lütfen aşşağıdaki adrese *[amount]* *[coin]* gönderin (10 USD) : 

*[adress]*

Bu adrese sadece *[time]* saat içerisinde ödeme yaparsanız kabul edilecektir.

Ödeme durumunuzu [bu linkten](*[statuslink]*) takip edebilirsiniz.
TelegramPaymentSuccessText:
*Ödeme başarıyla tamamlandı*

Gruba katılmak için aşşağıdaki davet linkini kullanın.(Eğer zaten gruptaysanız gerek yok.)

Gruba sadece ödeme yapılan telegram hesabı kabul edilecektir.
Link tek kullanımlıktır.
